img.bg {
      /* Set rules to fill background */
      min-height: 100%; 
      min-width: 1024px;
    
      /* Set up proportionate scaling */
      width: 100%;
      height: auto;
    
      /* Set up positioning */
      position: fixed;
      top: 0;
      left: 0;
    }
    
    @media screen and (max-width: 1024px) { /* Specific to this particular image */
      img.bg {
        left: 50%;
        margin-left: -512px;   /* 50% */
      }
    }
